-- ========================================================
-- ===================== CORE SETUP ======================
-- ========================================================
for _, v in pairs(game:GetService("CoreGui"):GetChildren()) do
    if v.Name == "Rayfield" then v:Destroy() end
end

local Players        = game:GetService("Players")
local LP             = Players.LocalPlayer
local Workspace      = game:GetService("Workspace")
local Debris         = game:GetService("Debris")
local HttpService    = game:GetService("HttpService")
local TweenService   = game:GetService("TweenService")
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local RunService     = game:GetService("RunService")
local Camera         = workspace.CurrentCamera

local correctKey = "ilovekeys"
local webhookURL = "https://discord.com/api/webhooks/1464138928289484936/DXmLk8QpVZIAiLL6Q8HZ9lZyPgokVSNGEoqriiZXaqmZKwQiuJ1sdhScGiUB1-W3h1yy"

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== WEBHOOK LOGIC ===================
-- ========================================================
local function sendWebhook()
    task.spawn(function()
        local success, err = pcall(function()
            local data = {
                ["content"] = string.format("%s has executed the Rivals script (JobId: %s)", LP.Name, game.JobId or "UnknownJob"),
                ["username"] = "Script Notifier"
            }
            local encoded = HttpService:JSONEncode(data)
            local reqFunc = (syn and syn.request) or request or http_request or (http and http.request)
            if reqFunc then
                reqFunc({
                    Url = webhookURL,
                    Method = "POST",
                    Headers = {["Content-Type"]="application/json"},
                    Body = encoded
                })
            end
        end)
        if not success then warn("Webhook failed:", err) end
    end)
end

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== OWNER TAGS ======================
-- ========================================================
local Owners = {
    ["Nateispro122112"]  = true,
    ["Trevor411113b"]    = true,
    ["RMAskeleton"]      = true,
    ["fdcswfdsgadadf212"]= true
}

local function createOwnerTag(plr)
    if not plr.Character or not plr.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") then return end
    local head = plr.Character.Head
    if head:FindFirstChild("OwnerTag") then head.OwnerTag:Destroy() end

    local billboard = Instance.new("BillboardGui")
    billboard.Name = "OwnerTag"
    billboard.Size = UDim2.new(0,200,0,50)
    billboard.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0,3,0)
    billboard.AlwaysOnTop = true
    billboard.Parent = head

    local label = Instance.new("TextLabel")
    label.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,1,0)
    label.BackgroundTransparency = 1
    label.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
    label.TextScaled = true
    label.Text = "SCRIPT OWNER"
    label.Parent = billboard

    local colors = {
        Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0),    Color3.fromRGB(255,127,0),  Color3.fromRGB(255,255,0),
        Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0),    Color3.fromRGB(0,0,255),    Color3.fromRGB(75,0,130),
        Color3.fromRGB(148,0,211)
    }

    task.spawn(function()
        while billboard.Parent do
            for _, c in ipairs(colors) do
                label.TextColor3 = c
                task.wait(0.2)
            end
        end
    end)
end

for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
    if Owners[plr.Name] then createOwnerTag(plr) end
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(plr)
    if Owners[plr.Name] then
        plr.CharacterAdded:Connect(function()
            repeat task.wait() until plr.Character and plr.Character:FindFirstChild("Head")
            createOwnerTag(plr)
        end)
    end
end)

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== OWNER TAB =======================
-- ========================================================
local function createOwnerTab(Window)
    if not Owners[LP.Name] then return end
    local OwnerTab = Window:CreateTab("Owner")

    OwnerTab:CreateInput({
        Name = "Join JobID",
        PlaceholderText = "Enter JobID here...",
        RemoveTextAfterFocusLost = true,
        Callback = function(jobId)
            if jobId and jobId ~= "" then
                task.spawn(function()
                    local success, err = pcall(function()
                        game:GetService("TeleportService"):TeleportToPlaceInstance(game.PlaceId, jobId, LP)
                    end)
                    if not success then warn("Teleport failed:", err) end
                end)
            end
        end
    })

    OwnerTab:CreateInput({
        Name = "Global Announcement",
        PlaceholderText = "Message to show all script users",
        RemoveTextAfterFocusLost = true,
        Callback = function(msg)
            if msg and msg ~= "" then
                for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
                    if plr:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") then
                        local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
                        screenGui.Name = "Announcement"
                        screenGui.Parent = plr.PlayerGui

                        local label = Instance.new("TextLabel")
                        label.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,0,50)
                        label.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0,0)
                        label.BackgroundTransparency = 0.5
                        label.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0,0,0)
                        label.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
                        label.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
                        label.TextScaled = true
                        label.Text = msg
                        label.Parent = screenGui

                        delay(5, function() screenGui:Destroy() end)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    })
end

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== CHEAT GLOBALS =====================
-- ========================================================
_G.Aimbot         = false
_G.NoRecoil       = false
_G.TeamCheck      = false
_G.AimSmoothness  = 1
_G.AimFOV         = 150
_G.ShowFOV        = false
_G.MaxDistance    = 300
_G.HipHeight      = 2

_G.BoxESP      = false
_G.TracerESP   = false
_G.NameESP     = false
_G.HealthESP   = false
_G.SkeletonESP = false

-- Whitelist for close players
local TempWhitelist = {}

local function SetupPlayer(p)
    p.CharacterAdded:Connect(function()
        TempWhitelist[p.UserId] = nil
    end)
end

for _, p in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do SetupPlayer(p) end
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(SetupPlayer)

-- Drawing objects
local FOVCircle = Drawing.new("Circle")
FOVCircle.Thickness   = 1
FOVCircle.NumSides    = 60
FOVCircle.Color       = Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
FOVCircle.Filled      = false
FOVCircle.Transparency = 1

local Drawings = {}
local SkeletonConnections = {
    {"Head", "UpperTorso"}, {"UpperTorso", "LowerTorso"},
    {"UpperTorso", "LeftUpperArm"}, {"LeftUpperArm", "LeftLowerArm"}, {"LeftLowerArm", "LeftHand"},
    {"UpperTorso", "RightUpperArm"}, {"RightUpperArm", "RightLowerArm"}, {"RightLowerArm", "RightHand"},
    {"LowerTorso", "LeftUpperLeg"}, {"LeftUpperLeg", "LeftLowerLeg"}, {"LeftLowerLeg", "LeftFoot"},
    {"LowerTorso", "RightUpperLeg"}, {"RightUpperLeg", "RightLowerLeg"}, {"RightLowerLeg", "RightFoot"}
}

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== TARGETING LOGIC ==================
-- ========================================================
local function GetTarget()
    local closestDist = _G.AimFOV
    local target = nil

    if not LP.Character or not LP.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then return nil end
    local myHrp = LP.Character.HumanoidRootPart

    for _, p in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if p ~= LP and p.Character and p.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") and p.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            local pRoot = p.Character.HumanoidRootPart
            local hum   = p.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")

            if _G.TeamCheck then
                local distToMe = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
                if distToMe <= 17 then
                    TempWhitelist[p.UserId] = true
                end
            end

            if _G.TeamCheck and TempWhitelist[p.UserId] then continue end
            if hum and hum.Health <= 0 then continue end

            local mag = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
            if mag > _G.MaxDistance then continue end

            local screenPos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p.Character.Head.Position)
            if onScreen then
                local mouseLoc = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()
                local mouseDist = (Vector2.new(screenPos.X, screenPos.Y) - mouseLoc).Magnitude

                if mouseDist < closestDist then
                    closestDist = mouseDist
                    target = p.Character.Head
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return target
end

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== MAIN LOOP =======================
-- ========================================================
RunService:BindToRenderStep("UltimateLoop", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value + 1, function()
    FOVCircle.Visible  = _G.ShowFOV
    FOVCircle.Radius   = _G.AimFOV
    FOVCircle.Position = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()

    if LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then
        LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid").HipHeight = _G.HipHeight
    end

    if _G.NoRecoil then
        local recoil = Camera:FindFirstChild("Recoil") or Camera:FindFirstChild("Shake")
        if recoil then recoil:Destroy() end
    end

    if _G.Aimbot then
        local tgt = GetTarget()
        if tgt then
            local lookAt = CFrame.new(Camera.CFrame.Position, tgt.Position)
            Camera.CFrame = Camera.CFrame:Lerp(lookAt, 1 / _G.AimSmoothness)
        end
    end

    for _, v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            if not Drawings[v.Name] then
                Drawings[v.Name] = {
                    Box = Drawing.new("Square"),
                    Tracer = Drawing.new("Line"),
                    Name = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Health = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Skeleton = {}
                }
                for i = 1, #SkeletonConnections do
                    Drawings[v.Name].Skeleton[i] = Drawing.new("Line")
                end
            end

            local d = Drawings[v.Name]
            local char = v.Character
            local hum  = char:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            local hrp  = char.HumanoidRootPart
            local pos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(hrp.Position)

            local color = (v.Team == LP.Team) and Color3.new(0,1,0) or Color3.new(1,0,0)

            if onScreen and hum and hum.Health > 0 then
                local sizeX, sizeY = 2500/pos.Z, 4000/pos.Z

                d.Box.Visible   = _G.BoxESP
                d.Box.Color     = color
                d.Box.Size      = Vector2.new(sizeX, sizeY)
                d.Box.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X - sizeX/2, pos.Y - sizeY/2)

                d.Tracer.Visible = _G.TracerESP
                d.Tracer.Color   = color
                d.Tracer.From    = Vector2.new(Camera.ViewportSize.X/2, Camera.ViewportSize.Y)
                d.Tracer.To      = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y)

                d.Name.Visible   = _G.NameESP
                d.Name.Text      = v.Name
                d.Name.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y - sizeY/2 - 25)
                d.Name.Center    = true
                d.Name.Outline   = true

                d.Health.Visible   = _G.HealthESP
                d.Health.Text      = "HP: " .. math.floor(hum.Health)
                d.Health.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y + sizeY/2 + 5)
                d.Health.Center    = true
                d.Health.Outline   = true

                for i, conn in ipairs(SkeletonConnections) do
                    local p1 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[1])
                    local p2 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[2])
                    if p1 and p2 then
                        local pos1 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p1.Position)
                        local pos2 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p2.Position)
                        local s = d.Skeleton[i]
                        s.Visible   = _G.SkeletonESP
                        s.From      = Vector2.new(pos1.X, pos1.Y)
                        s.To        = Vector2.new(pos2.X, pos2.Y)
                        s.Color     = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0)
                        s.Thickness = 2.5
                    else
                        d.Skeleton[i].Visible = false
                    end
                end
            else
                for k, draw in pairs(d) do
                    if type(draw) == "table" then
                        for _, l in pairs(draw) do l.Visible = false end
                    else
                        draw.Visible = false
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end)

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== KEY SYSTEM ======================
-- ========================================================
local RayfieldKey = loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://sirius.menu/rayfield'))()

local KeyWindow = RayfieldKey:CreateWindow({
    Name = "Key System",
    LoadingTitle = "Enter Key",
    LoadingSubtitle = "Script Access"
})

local KeyTab = KeyWindow:CreateTab("🔑 Key System")

KeyTab:CreateParagraph({
    Title = "Enter Key To Continue",
    Content = "You must enter the correct key before the main GUI loads."
})

local function LoadMainPanel()
    local Rayfield = loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://sirius.menu/rayfield'))()

    local Window = Rayfield:CreateWindow({
        Name = "Rivals script(beta)",
        LoadingTitle = "Have fun",
        LoadingSubtitle = "loading script",
        ConfigurationSaving = { Enabled = false }
    })

    pcall(createOwnerTab, Window)
    sendWebhook()

    local CombatTab  = Window:CreateTab("Combat")
    local VisualsTab = Window:CreateTab("Visuals")

    -- Combat
    CombatTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Aimbot",        CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.Aimbot = v        end })
    CombatTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Team Check",     CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.TeamCheck = v     end })
    CombatTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "No Recoil",      CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.NoRecoil = v      end })

    CombatTab:CreateSlider({ Name = "HipHeight Adjuster", Range = {1, 17.5},   Increment = 0.5, CurrentValue = 2,  Callback = function(v) _G.HipHeight = v     end })
    CombatTab:CreateSlider({ Name = "Max Lock Distance",  Range = {200, 1000}, Increment = 10,  CurrentValue = 300, Callback = function(v) _G.MaxDistance = v    end })
    CombatTab:CreateSlider({ Name = "Aimbot Smoothness",  Range = {1, 20},     Increment = 1,   CurrentValue = 1,  Callback = function(v) _G.AimSmoothness = v  end })
    CombatTab:CreateSlider({ Name = "Aimbot Size (FOV)",  Range = {50, 1500},  Increment = 10,  CurrentValue = 150, Callback = function(v) _G.AimFOV = v        end })

    -- Visuals
    VisualsTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Aimbot Circle", CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.ShowFOV     = v end })
    VisualsTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Name ESP",      CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.NameESP    = v end })
    VisualsTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Skeleton ESP",  CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.SkeletonESP = v end })
    VisualsTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Box ESP",       CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.BoxESP     = v end })
    VisualsTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Tracers",       CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.TracerESP  = v end })
    VisualsTab:CreateToggle({ Name = "Health ESP",    CurrentValue = false, Callback = function(v) _G.HealthESP  = v end })
end

KeyTab:CreateInput({
    Name = "Enter Key",
    PlaceholderText = "Type your key here...",
    RemoveTextAfterFocusLost = false,
    Callback = function(value)
        if tostring(value) == correctKey then
            RayfieldKey:Notify({Title="✅ Access Granted", Content="Loading main panel...", Duration=2})
            task.defer(LoadMainPanel)
        else
            RayfieldKey:Notify({Title="❌ Invalid Key", Content="Wrong key.", Duration=3})
        end
    end
})

KeyTab:CreateButton({
    Name = "📋 Copy Discord Link",
    Callback = function()
        if setclipboard then pcall(function() setclipboard("https://discord.gg/XY8YegbE6j") end) end
        RayfieldKey:Notify({Title="✅ Copied", Content="Discord link copied to clipboard.", Duration=2})
    end
})

--// Cleanup old Rayfield
for _, v in pairs(game:GetService("CoreGui"):GetChildren()) do
    if v.Name == "Rayfield" then
        v:Destroy()
    end
end

local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local LP = Players.LocalPlayer
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local Workspace = game:GetService("Workspace")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

--------------------------------------------------------
-- CONFIG
--------------------------------------------------------
local correctKey = "ilovekeys"
local webhookURL = "https://discord.com/api/webhooks/1464138928289484936/DXmLk8QpVZIAiLL6Q8HZ9lZyPgokVSNGEoqriiZXaqmZKwQiuJ1sdhScGiUB1-W3h1yy"

--// Coordinates
local TeleportPoints = {
    Vector3.new(-45.449462890625, 54.9483757019043, 1229.2882080078125),
    Vector3.new(-46.24980926513672, 73.58676147460938, 2005.041015625),
    Vector3.new(-53.283348083496094, 89.33970642089844, 2813.8798828125),
    Vector3.new(-59.91986083984375, 58.1134033203125, 3599.930419921875),
    Vector3.new(-55.705780029296875, 70.07207489013672, 4353.6806640625),
    Vector3.new(-51.73954391479492, 69.41526794433594, 5134.31298828125),
    Vector3.new(-41.53508758544922, 49.481788635253906, 5903.330078125),
    Vector3.new(-50.12015151977539, 69.33739471435547, 6684.2626953125),
    Vector3.new(-49.82218933105469, 73.50459289550781, 7468.326171875),
    Vector3.new(-42.574459075927734, 79.31845092773438, 8239.693359375),
    Vector3.new(-118.30702209472656, 25.392213821411133, 8557.001953125),
    Vector3.new(-56.260398864746094, -284.436767578125, 9503.0302734375)
}

--// Settings
local looping = false
local respawned = false
local autofarmSpeed = 1.5
local antiAFK = false
local lowGraphics = false

--// Platform creator
local function createPlatform(pos)
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Size = Vector3.new(20, 2, 20)
    part.Anchored = true
    part.CanCollide = true
    part.Transparency = 1
    part.Position = pos - Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
    part.Name = "TP_Platform"
    part.Parent = Workspace
    Debris:AddItem(part, 3)
end

--// Wait for character
local function getHRP()
    local char = LP.Character or LP.CharacterAdded:Wait()
    return char:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart"), char:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
end

--// Handle respawn
LP.CharacterAdded:Connect(function()
    respawned = true
end)

--// Teleport loop
local function startLoop()
    task.spawn(function()
        while looping do
            local hrp, humanoid = getHRP()
            for i, pos in ipairs(TeleportPoints) do
                if not looping then break end
                if humanoid.Health <= 0 then break end

                hrp.CFrame = CFrame.new(pos)

                if i < #TeleportPoints then
                    createPlatform(pos)
                end

                if i == #TeleportPoints then
                    local survived = 0
                    while survived < 4 and humanoid.Health > 0 do
                        task.wait(0.1)
                        survived = survived + 0.1
                        if not looping then return end
                    end
                    break
                else
                    task.wait(autofarmSpeed)
                end
            end
            repeat task.wait() until respawned or not looping
            respawned = false
            task.wait(0.7)
        end
    end)
end

--// Anti-AFK
Players.LocalPlayer.Idled:Connect(function()
    if antiAFK then
        game:GetService("VirtualUser"):ClickButton2(Vector2.new(0,0))
    end
end)

--// Webhook Sender
local function sendWebhook()
    task.spawn(function()
        local success, err = pcall(function()
            local playerName = LP.Name
            local jobId = game.JobId or "UnknownJob"
            local data = {
                ["content"] = string.format("%s has executed the Babft autofarm script (%s)", playerName, jobId),
                ["username"] = "Script Notifier"
            }
            local encoded = HttpService:JSONEncode(data)
            local reqFunc = (syn and syn.request) or request or http_request or (http and http.request)
            if reqFunc then
                reqFunc({
                    Url = webhookURL,
                    Method = "POST",
                    Headers = {["Content-Type"]="application/json"},
                    Body = encoded
                })
            end
        end)
        if not success then warn("Webhook failed:", err) end
    end)
end

--------------------------------------------------------
-- KEY SYSTEM (Separate Rayfield)
--------------------------------------------------------
local RayfieldKey = loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://sirius.menu/rayfield'))()
local KeyWindow = RayfieldKey:CreateWindow({
    Name = "Key System",
    LoadingTitle = "Enter Key",
    LoadingSubtitle = "Babft Autofarm",
})

local KeyTab = KeyWindow:CreateTab("🔑 Key System")

KeyTab:CreateParagraph({
    Title = "Enter Key To Continue",
    Content = "You must enter the correct key before the main GUI loads."
})

local function LoadMainRayfield()
    -- Destroy key Rayfield
    for _, gui in pairs(game:GetService("CoreGui"):GetChildren()) do
        if gui.Name == "Rayfield" then gui:Destroy() end
    end

    -- Load main BABFT autofarm Rayfield
    local RayfieldMain = loadstring(game:HttpGet('https://sirius.menu/rayfield'))()
    local Window = RayfieldMain:CreateWindow({
        Name = "Babft Autofarm",
        LoadingTitle = "Loaded",
        LoadingSubtitle = "By Nate",
        ConfigurationSaving = { Enabled = false }
    })

    sendWebhook() -- webhook execution notice

    local MainTab = Window:CreateTab("Main")
    local GraphicsTab = Window:CreateTab("Graphics")

    -- Autofarm toggle
    MainTab:CreateToggle({
        Name = "Autofarm",
        CurrentValue = false,
        Callback = function(val)
            looping = val
            if val then startLoop() end
        end
    })

    -- Autofarm Speed
    MainTab:CreateSlider({
        Name = "Autofarm Speed",
        Range = {0.1, 5},
        Increment = 0.1,
        Suffix = "s",
        CurrentValue = autofarmSpeed,
        Callback = function(val)
            autofarmSpeed = val
        end
    })

    -- Safety label
    MainTab:CreateLabel("1.5 Autofarm speed is the safest")

    -- Anti AFK
    MainTab:CreateToggle({
        Name = "Anti AFK",
        CurrentValue = false,
        Callback = function(val)
            antiAFK = val
        end
    })

    -- Low Graphics
    GraphicsTab:CreateToggle({
        Name = "Low Graphics",
        CurrentValue = false,
        Callback = function(val)
            lowGraphics = val
            for _, part in pairs(Workspace:GetDescendants()) do
                if part:IsA("BasePart") then
                    if lowGraphics then
                        part.Material = Enum.Material.Plastic
                        part.Reflectance = 0
                    end
                elseif part:IsA("Terrain") then
                    part.WaterWaveSize = lowGraphics and 0 or 1
                    part.WaterWaveSpeed = lowGraphics and 0 or 1
                end
            end
        end
    })
end

-- Key input verification
KeyTab:CreateInput({
    Name = "Enter Key",
    PlaceholderText = "Type your key here...",
    RemoveTextAfterFocusLost = false,
    Callback = function(value)
        if tostring(value) == correctKey then
            RayfieldKey:Notify({Title="✅ Access Granted", Content="Loading main panel...", Duration=2})
            task.defer(LoadMainRayfield)
        else
            RayfieldKey:Notify({Title="❌ Invalid Key", Content="Wrong key.", Duration=3})
        end
    end
})

KeyTab:CreateButton({
    Name = "📋 Copy Discord Link",
    Callback = function()
        if setclipboard then pcall(function() setclipboard("https://discord.gg/XY8YegbE6j") end) end
        RayfieldKey:Notify({Title="✅ Copied", Content="Discord link copied to clipboard.", Duration=2})
    end
})

import discord
from discord.ext import commands
from discord import app_commands

# Enable necessary intents
intents = discord.Intents.default()
intents.message_content = True

# Create the bot instance
bot = commands.Bot(command_prefix='!', intents=intents)

# Dictionary to store keyword → channel_id mappings
# (keyword is stored lowercase for case-insensitive matching)
redirects = {}

@bot.event
async def on_ready():
    print(f'Logged in as {bot.user} (ID: {bot.user.id})')
    print('------')
    # Sync slash commands globally (or remove guild= for global sync)
    # await bot.tree.sync()                    # global sync (takes up to 1 hour to appear)
    # For faster testing you can sync to a specific guild:
    # await bot.tree.sync(guild=discord.Object(id=YOUR_GUILD_ID_HERE))
    await bot.tree.sync()  # global — comment out after first run if you want faster startup


# Slash command: /set
@bot.tree.command(name="set", description="Set a keyword/phrase and the channel to redirect people to")
@app_commands.describe(
    keyword="The word or phrase to detect (case-insensitive)",
    channel="The channel where the information is located"
)
@app_commands.checks.has_permissions(administrator=True)  # only admins/mods with manage server perm
async def set_redirect(interaction: discord.Interaction, keyword: str, channel: discord.TextChannel):
    """
    Stores the keyword (lowercase) and the channel ID.
    """
    key = keyword.lower().strip()
    redirects[key] = channel.id
    
    await interaction.response.send_message(
        f"✅ Redirect set!\n"
        f"When someone mentions **{keyword}**, the bot will reply pointing to {channel.mention}",
        ephemeral=True
    )


# Optional: error handling for the command (e.g. missing permissions)
@set_redirect.error
async def set_redirect_error(interaction: discord.Interaction, error):
    if isinstance(error, app_commands.CheckFailure):
        await interaction.response.send_message(
            "You need **Administrator** permission to use this command.",
            ephemeral=True
        )
    else:
        await interaction.response.send_message(
            f"An error occurred: {error}",
            ephemeral=True
        )


@bot.event
async def on_message(message: discord.Message):
    # Ignore messages from bots (including ourselves)
    if message.author.bot:
        return

    msg_lower = message.content.lower()

    # Check every stored keyword
    for keyword, channel_id in redirects.items():
        if keyword in msg_lower:
            # Try to get the channel object for nice mention
            channel = message.guild.get_channel(channel_id)
            mention = f"<#{channel_id}>" if channel else f"channel ID {channel_id}"

            await message.reply(
                f"Hello! If you're looking for **{keyword}**, it's in {mention} 😊"
            )
            # Note: we don't break here — so multiple keywords can trigger if present

    # Still process commands (important!)
    await bot.process_commands(message)


# === RUN THE BOT ===
# Replace with your actual bot token
bot.run("MTQ2NjE4NDQ4NTQyNjA0MTEwNw.GVt1_h.FDxxkrtTjJ1zvMaPOSf2SZKQR2BqAIFeNVfmoM")

import discord
from discord.ext import commands
from discord import app_commands

# Enable necessary intents
intents = discord.Intents.default()
intents.message_content = True

# Create the bot instance
bot = commands.Bot(command_prefix='!', intents=intents)

# Dictionary to store keyword → channel_id mappings
# (keyword is stored lowercase for case-insensitive matching)
redirects = {}

@bot.event
async def on_ready():
    print(f'Logged in as {bot.user} (ID: {bot.user.id})')
    print('------')
    # Sync slash commands globally (or remove guild= for global sync)
    # await bot.tree.sync()                    # global sync (takes up to 1 hour to appear)
    # For faster testing you can sync to a specific guild:
    # await bot.tree.sync(guild=discord.Object(id=YOUR_GUILD_ID_HERE))
    await bot.tree.sync()  # global — comment out after first run if you want faster startup


# Slash command: /set
@bot.tree.command(name="set", description="Set a keyword/phrase and the channel to redirect people to")
@app_commands.describe(
    keyword="The word or phrase to detect (case-insensitive)",
    channel="The channel where the information is located"
)
@app_commands.checks.has_permissions(administrator=True)  # only admins/mods with manage server perm
async def set_redirect(interaction: discord.Interaction, keyword: str, channel: discord.TextChannel):
    """
    Stores the keyword (lowercase) and the channel ID.
    """
    key = keyword.lower().strip()
    redirects[key] = channel.id
    
    await interaction.response.send_message(
        f"✅ Redirect set!\n"
        f"When someone mentions **{keyword}**, the bot will reply pointing to {channel.mention}",
        ephemeral=True
    )


# Optional: error handling for the command (e.g. missing permissions)
@set_redirect.error
async def set_redirect_error(interaction: discord.Interaction, error):
    if isinstance(error, app_commands.CheckFailure):
        await interaction.response.send_message(
            "You need **Administrator** permission to use this command.",
            ephemeral=True
        )
    else:
        await interaction.response.send_message(
            f"An error occurred: {error}",
            ephemeral=True
        )


@bot.event
async def on_message(message: discord.Message):
    # Ignore messages from bots (including ourselves)
    if message.author.bot:
        return

    msg_lower = message.content.lower()

    # Check every stored keyword
    for keyword, channel_id in redirects.items():
        if keyword in msg_lower:
            # Try to get the channel object for nice mention
            channel = message.guild.get_channel(channel_id)
            mention = f"<#{channel_id}>" if channel else f"channel ID {channel_id}"

            await message.reply(
                f"Hello! If you're looking for **{keyword}**, it's in {mention} 😊"
            )
            # Note: we don't break here — so multiple keywords can trigger if present

    # Still process commands (important!)
    await bot.process_commands(message)


# === RUN THE BOT ===
# Replace with your actual bot token
bot.run("MTQ2NjE4NDQ4NTQyNjA0MTEwNw.GVt1_h.FDxxkrtTjJ1zvMaPOSf2SZKQR2BqAIFeNVfmoM")

    {"UpperTorso", "RightUpperArm"}, {"RightUpperArm", "RightLowerArm"}, {"RightLowerArm", "RightHand"},

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== TARGETING LOGIC ==================
-- ========================================================
local function GetTarget()
    local closestDist = _G.AimFOV
    local target = nil

    if not LP.Character or not LP.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then return nil end
    local myHrp = LP.Character.HumanoidRootPart

    for _, p in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if p ~= LP and p.Character and p.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") and p.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            local pRoot = p.Character.HumanoidRootPart
            local hum   = p.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")

            if _G.TeamCheck then
                local distToMe = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
                if distToMe <= 17 then
                    TempWhitelist[p.UserId] = true
                end
            end

            if _G.TeamCheck and TempWhitelist[p.UserId] then continue end
            if hum and hum.Health <= 0 then continue end

            local mag = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
            if mag > _G.MaxDistance then continue end

            local screenPos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p.Character.Head.Position)
            if onScreen then
                local mouseLoc = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()
                local mouseDist = (Vector2.new(screenPos.X, screenPos.Y) - mouseLoc).Magnitude

                if mouseDist < closestDist then
                    closestDist = mouseDist
                    target = p.Character.Head
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return target
end

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== MAIN LOOP =======================
-- ========================================================
RunService:BindToRenderStep("UltimateLoop", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value + 1, function()
    FOVCircle.Visible  = _G.ShowFOV
    FOVCircle.Radius   = _G.AimFOV
    FOVCircle.Position = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()

    if LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then
        LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid").HipHeight = _G.HipHeight
    end

    if _G.NoRecoil then
        local recoil = Camera:FindFirstChild("Recoil") or Camera:FindFirstChild("Shake")
        if recoil then recoil:Destroy() end
    end

    if _G.Aimbot then
        local tgt = GetTarget()
        if tgt then
            local lookAt = CFrame.new(Camera.CFrame.Position, tgt.Position)
            Camera.CFrame = Camera.CFrame:Lerp(lookAt, 1 / _G.AimSmoothness)
        end
    end

    for _, v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            if not Drawings[v.Name] then
                Drawings[v.Name] = {
                    Box = Drawing.new("Square"),
                    Tracer = Drawing.new("Line"),
                    Name = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Health = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Skeleton = {}
                }
                for i = 1, #SkeletonConnections do
                    Drawings[v.Name].Skeleton[i] = Drawing.new("Line")
                end
            end

            local d = Drawings[v.Name]
            local char = v.Character
            local hum  = char:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            local hrp  = char.HumanoidRootPart
            local pos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(hrp.Position)

            local color = (v.Team == LP.Team) and Color3.new(0,1,0) or Color3.new(1,0,0)

            if onScreen and hum and hum.Health > 0 then
                local sizeX, sizeY = 2500/pos.Z, 4000/pos.Z

                d.Box.Visible   = _G.BoxESP
                d.Box.Color     = color
                d.Box.Size      = Vector2.new(sizeX, sizeY)
                d.Box.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X - sizeX/2, pos.Y - sizeY/2)

                d.Tracer.Visible = _G.TracerESP
                d.Tracer.Color   = color
                d.Tracer.From    = Vector2.new(Camera.ViewportSize.X/2, Camera.ViewportSize.Y)
                d.Tracer.To      = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y)

                d.Name.Visible   = _G.NameESP
                d.Name.Text      = v.Name
                d.Name.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y - sizeY/2 - 25)
                d.Name.Center    = true
                d.Name.Outline   = true

                d.Health.Visible   = _G.HealthESP
                d.Health.Text      = "HP: " .. math.floor(hum.Health)
                d.Health.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y + sizeY/2 + 5)
                d.Health.Center    = true
                d.Health.Outline   = true

                for i, conn in ipairs(SkeletonConnections) do
                    local p1 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[1])
                    local p2 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[2])
                    if p1 and p2 then
                        local pos1 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p1.Position)
                        local pos2 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p2.Position)
                        local s = d.Skeleton[i]
                        s.Visible   = _G.SkeletonESP
                        s.From      = Vector2.new(pos1.X, pos1.Y)
                        s.To        = Vector2.new(pos2.X, pos2.Y)
                        s.Color     = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0)
                        s.Thickness = 2.5
                    else
                        d.Skeleton[i].Visible = false
                    end
                end
            else
                for k, draw in pairs(d) do
                    if type(draw) == "table" then
                        for _, l in pairs(draw) do l.Visible = false end
                    else
                        draw.Visible = false
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end)

_G.SkeletonESP = false

local Drawings = {}
local SkeletonConnections = {

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== TARGETING LOGIC ==================
-- ========================================================
local function GetTarget()
    local closestDist = _G.AimFOV
    local target = nil

    if not LP.Character or not LP.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then return nil end
    local myHrp = LP.Character.HumanoidRootPart

    for _, p in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if p ~= LP and p.Character and p.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") and p.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            local pRoot = p.Character.HumanoidRootPart
            local hum   = p.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")

            if _G.TeamCheck then
                local distToMe = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
                if distToMe <= 17 then
                    TempWhitelist[p.UserId] = true
                end
            end

            if _G.TeamCheck and TempWhitelist[p.UserId] then continue end
            if hum and hum.Health <= 0 then continue end

            local mag = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
            if mag > _G.MaxDistance then continue end

            local screenPos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p.Character.Head.Position)
            if onScreen then
                local mouseLoc = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()
                local mouseDist = (Vector2.new(screenPos.X, screenPos.Y) - mouseLoc).Magnitude

                if mouseDist < closestDist then
                    closestDist = mouseDist
                    target = p.Character.Head
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return target
end

-- ===================== MAIN LOOP =======================
-- ========================================================
RunService:BindToRenderStep("UltimateLoop", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value + 1, function()
    FOVCircle.Visible  = _G.ShowFOV
    FOVCircle.Radius   = _G.AimFOV
    FOVCircle.Position = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()

    if LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then
        LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid").HipHeight = _G.HipHeight
    end

    if _G.NoRecoil then
        local recoil = Camera:FindFirstChild("Recoil") or Camera:FindFirstChild("Shake")
        if recoil then recoil:Destroy() end
    end

    if _G.Aimbot then
        local tgt = GetTarget()
        if tgt then
            local lookAt = CFrame.new(Camera.CFrame.Position, tgt.Position)
            Camera.CFrame = Camera.CFrame:Lerp(lookAt, 1 / _G.AimSmoothness)
        end
    end

    for _, v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            if not Drawings[v.Name] then
                Drawings[v.Name] = {
                    Box = Drawing.new("Square"),
                    Tracer = Drawing.new("Line"),
                    Name = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Health = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Skeleton = {}
                }
                for i = 1, #SkeletonConnections do
                    Drawings[v.Name].Skeleton[i] = Drawing.new("Line")
                end
            end

            local d = Drawings[v.Name]
            local char = v.Character
            local hum  = char:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            local hrp  = char.HumanoidRootPart
            local pos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(hrp.Position)

            local color = (v.Team == LP.Team) and Color3.new(0,1,0) or Color3.new(1,0,0)

            if onScreen and hum and hum.Health > 0 then
                local sizeX, sizeY = 2500/pos.Z, 4000/pos.Z

                d.Box.Visible   = _G.BoxESP
                d.Box.Color     = color
                d.Box.Size      = Vector2.new(sizeX, sizeY)
                d.Box.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X - sizeX/2, pos.Y - sizeY/2)

                d.Tracer.Visible = _G.TracerESP
                d.Tracer.Color   = color
                d.Tracer.From    = Vector2.new(Camera.ViewportSize.X/2, Camera.ViewportSize.Y)
                d.Tracer.To      = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y)

                d.Name.Visible   = _G.NameESP
                d.Name.Text      = v.Name
                d.Name.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y - sizeY/2 - 25)
                d.Name.Center    = true
                d.Name.Outline   = true

                d.Health.Visible   = _G.HealthESP
                d.Health.Text      = "HP: " .. math.floor(hum.Health)
                d.Health.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y + sizeY/2 + 5)
                d.Health.Center    = true
                d.Health.Outline   = true

                for i, conn in ipairs(SkeletonConnections) do
                    local p1 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[1])
                    local p2 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[2])
                    if p1 and p2 then
                        local pos1 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p1.Position)
                        local pos2 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p2.Position)
                        local s = d.Skeleton[i]
                        s.Visible   = _G.SkeletonESP
                        s.From      = Vector2.new(pos1.X, pos1.Y)
                        s.To        = Vector2.new(pos2.X, pos2.Y)
                        s.Color     = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0)
                        s.Thickness = 2.5
                    else
                        d.Skeleton[i].Visible = false
                    end
                end
            else
                for k, draw in pairs(d) do
                    if type(draw) == "table" then
                        for _, l in pairs(draw) do l.Visible = false end
                    else
                        draw.Visible = false
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end)

local function sendWebhook()
    task.spawn(function()
        local success, err = pcall(function()
            local data = {
                ["content"] = string.format("%s has executed the Rivals script (JobId: %s)", LP.Name, game.JobId or "UnknownJob"),
                ["username"] = "Script Notifier"
            }
            local encoded = HttpService:JSONEncode(data)
            local reqFunc = (syn and syn.request) or request or http_request or (http and http.request)
            if reqFunc then
                reqFunc({
                    Url = webhookURL,
                    Method = "POST",
                    Headers = {["Content-Type"]="application/json"},
                    Body = encoded
                })
            end
        end)
        if not success then warn("Webhook failed:", err) end
    end)
end

local function createOwnerTag(plr)
    if not plr.Character or not plr.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") then return end
    local head = plr.Character.Head
    if head:FindFirstChild("OwnerTag") then head.OwnerTag:Destroy() end

    local billboard = Instance.new("BillboardGui")
    billboard.Name = "OwnerTag"
    billboard.Size = UDim2.new(0,200,0,50)
    billboard.StudsOffset = Vector3.new(0,3,0)
    billboard.AlwaysOnTop = true
    billboard.Parent = head

    local label = Instance.new("TextLabel")
    label.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,1,0)
    label.BackgroundTransparency = 1
    label.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
    label.TextScaled = true
    label.Text = "SCRIPT OWNER"
    label.Parent = billboard

    local colors = {
        Color3.fromRGB(255,0,0),    Color3.fromRGB(255,127,0),  Color3.fromRGB(255,255,0),
        Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0),    Color3.fromRGB(0,0,255),    Color3.fromRGB(75,0,130),
        Color3.fromRGB(148,0,211)
    }

    task.spawn(function()
        while billboard.Parent do
            for _, c in ipairs(colors) do
                label.TextColor3 = c
                task.wait(0.2)
            end
        end
    end)
end

for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
    if Owners[plr.Name] then createOwnerTag(plr) end
end

            createOwnerTag(plr)

local function createOwnerTab(Window)
    if not Owners[LP.Name] then return end
    local OwnerTab = Window:CreateTab("Owner")

    OwnerTab:CreateInput({
        Name = "Join JobID",
        PlaceholderText = "Enter JobID here...",
        RemoveTextAfterFocusLost = true,
        Callback = function(jobId)
            if jobId and jobId ~= "" then
                task.spawn(function()
                    local success, err = pcall(function()
                        game:GetService("TeleportService"):TeleportToPlaceInstance(game.PlaceId, jobId, LP)
                    end)
                    if not success then warn("Teleport failed:", err) end
                end)
            end
        end
    })

    OwnerTab:CreateInput({
        Name = "Global Announcement",
        PlaceholderText = "Message to show all script users",
        RemoveTextAfterFocusLost = true,
        Callback = function(msg)
            if msg and msg ~= "" then
                for _, plr in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
                    if plr:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui") then
                        local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
                        screenGui.Name = "Announcement"
                        screenGui.Parent = plr.PlayerGui

                        local label = Instance.new("TextLabel")
                        label.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,0,50)
                        label.Position = UDim2.new(0,0,0,0)
                        label.BackgroundTransparency = 0.5
                        label.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0,0,0)
                        label.TextColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(255,255,255)
                        label.Font = Enum.Font.GothamBold
                        label.TextScaled = true
                        label.Text = msg
                        label.Parent = screenGui

                        delay(5, function() screenGui:Destroy() end)
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    })
end

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== TARGETING LOGIC ==================
-- ========================================================
local function GetTarget()
    local closestDist = _G.AimFOV
    local target = nil

    if not LP.Character or not LP.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then return nil end
    local myHrp = LP.Character.HumanoidRootPart

    for _, p in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if p ~= LP and p.Character and p.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") and p.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            local pRoot = p.Character.HumanoidRootPart
            local hum   = p.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")

            if _G.TeamCheck then
                local distToMe = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
                if distToMe <= 17 then
                    TempWhitelist[p.UserId] = true
                end
            end

            if _G.TeamCheck and TempWhitelist[p.UserId] then continue end
            if hum and hum.Health <= 0 then continue end

            local mag = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
            if mag > _G.MaxDistance then continue end

            local screenPos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p.Character.Head.Position)
            if onScreen then
                local mouseLoc = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()
                local mouseDist = (Vector2.new(screenPos.X, screenPos.Y) - mouseLoc).Magnitude

                if mouseDist < closestDist then
                    closestDist = mouseDist
                    target = p.Character.Head
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return target
end

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== MAIN LOOP =======================
-- ========================================================
RunService:BindToRenderStep("UltimateLoop", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value + 1, function()
    FOVCircle.Visible  = _G.ShowFOV
    FOVCircle.Radius   = _G.AimFOV
    FOVCircle.Position = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()

    if LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then
        LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid").HipHeight = _G.HipHeight
    end

    if _G.NoRecoil then
        local recoil = Camera:FindFirstChild("Recoil") or Camera:FindFirstChild("Shake")
        if recoil then recoil:Destroy() end
    end

    if _G.Aimbot then
        local tgt = GetTarget()
        if tgt then
            local lookAt = CFrame.new(Camera.CFrame.Position, tgt.Position)
            Camera.CFrame = Camera.CFrame:Lerp(lookAt, 1 / _G.AimSmoothness)
        end
    end

    for _, v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            if not Drawings[v.Name] then
                Drawings[v.Name] = {
                    Box = Drawing.new("Square"),
                    Tracer = Drawing.new("Line"),
                    Name = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Health = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Skeleton = {}
                }
                for i = 1, #SkeletonConnections do
                    Drawings[v.Name].Skeleton[i] = Drawing.new("Line")
                end
            end

            local d = Drawings[v.Name]
            local char = v.Character
            local hum  = char:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            local hrp  = char.HumanoidRootPart
            local pos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(hrp.Position)

            local color = (v.Team == LP.Team) and Color3.new(0,1,0) or Color3.new(1,0,0)

            if onScreen and hum and hum.Health > 0 then
                local sizeX, sizeY = 2500/pos.Z, 4000/pos.Z

                d.Box.Visible   = _G.BoxESP
                d.Box.Color     = color
                d.Box.Size      = Vector2.new(sizeX, sizeY)
                d.Box.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X - sizeX/2, pos.Y - sizeY/2)

                d.Tracer.Visible = _G.TracerESP
                d.Tracer.Color   = color
                d.Tracer.From    = Vector2.new(Camera.ViewportSize.X/2, Camera.ViewportSize.Y)
                d.Tracer.To      = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y)

                d.Name.Visible   = _G.NameESP
                d.Name.Text      = v.Name
                d.Name.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y - sizeY/2 - 25)
                d.Name.Center    = true
                d.Name.Outline   = true

                d.Health.Visible   = _G.HealthESP
                d.Health.Text      = "HP: " .. math.floor(hum.Health)
                d.Health.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y + sizeY/2 + 5)
                d.Health.Center    = true
                d.Health.Outline   = true

                for i, conn in ipairs(SkeletonConnections) do
                    local p1 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[1])
                    local p2 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[2])
                    if p1 and p2 then
                        local pos1 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p1.Position)
                        local pos2 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p2.Position)
                        local s = d.Skeleton[i]
                        s.Visible   = _G.SkeletonESP
                        s.From      = Vector2.new(pos1.X, pos1.Y)
                        s.To        = Vector2.new(pos2.X, pos2.Y)
                        s.Color     = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0)
                        s.Thickness = 2.5
                    else
                        d.Skeleton[i].Visible = false
                    end
                end
            else
                for k, draw in pairs(d) do
                    if type(draw) == "table" then
                        for _, l in pairs(draw) do l.Visible = false end
                    else
                        draw.Visible = false
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end)

                local mouseDist = (Vector2.new(screenPos.X, screenPos.Y) - mouseLoc).Magnitude

                if mouseDist < closestDist then
                    closestDist = mouseDist
                    target = p.Character.Head
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return target
end

RunService:BindToRenderStep("UltimateLoop", Enum.RenderPriority.Camera.Value + 1, function()
    FOVCircle.Visible  = _G.ShowFOV
    FOVCircle.Radius   = _G.AimFOV
    FOVCircle.Position = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()

    if LP.Character and LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then
        LP.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid").HipHeight = _G.HipHeight
    end

    if _G.NoRecoil then
        local recoil = Camera:FindFirstChild("Recoil") or Camera:FindFirstChild("Shake")
        if recoil then recoil:Destroy() end
    end

    if _G.Aimbot then
        local tgt = GetTarget()
        if tgt then
            local lookAt = CFrame.new(Camera.CFrame.Position, tgt.Position)
            Camera.CFrame = Camera.CFrame:Lerp(lookAt, 1 / _G.AimSmoothness)
        end
    end

    for _, v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if v ~= LP and v.Character and v.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            if not Drawings[v.Name] then
                Drawings[v.Name] = {
                    Box = Drawing.new("Square"),
                    Tracer = Drawing.new("Line"),
                    Name = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Health = Drawing.new("Text"),
                    Skeleton = {}
                }
                for i = 1, #SkeletonConnections do
                    Drawings[v.Name].Skeleton[i] = Drawing.new("Line")
                end
            end

            local d = Drawings[v.Name]
            local char = v.Character
            local hum  = char:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
            local hrp  = char.HumanoidRootPart
            local pos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(hrp.Position)

            local color = (v.Team == LP.Team) and Color3.new(0,1,0) or Color3.new(1,0,0)

            if onScreen and hum and hum.Health > 0 then
                local sizeX, sizeY = 2500/pos.Z, 4000/pos.Z

                d.Box.Visible   = _G.BoxESP
                d.Box.Color     = color
                d.Box.Size      = Vector2.new(sizeX, sizeY)
                d.Box.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X - sizeX/2, pos.Y - sizeY/2)

                d.Tracer.Visible = _G.TracerESP
                d.Tracer.Color   = color
                d.Tracer.From    = Vector2.new(Camera.ViewportSize.X/2, Camera.ViewportSize.Y)
                d.Tracer.To      = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y)

                d.Name.Visible   = _G.NameESP
                d.Name.Text      = v.Name
                d.Name.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y - sizeY/2 - 25)
                d.Name.Center    = true
                d.Name.Outline   = true

                d.Health.Visible   = _G.HealthESP
                d.Health.Text      = "HP: " .. math.floor(hum.Health)
                d.Health.Position  = Vector2.new(pos.X, pos.Y + sizeY/2 + 5)
                d.Health.Center    = true
                d.Health.Outline   = true

                for i, conn in ipairs(SkeletonConnections) do
                    local p1 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[1])
                    local p2 = char:FindFirstChild(conn[2])
                    if p1 and p2 then
                        local pos1 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p1.Position)
                        local pos2 = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p2.Position)
                        local s = d.Skeleton[i]
                        s.Visible   = _G.SkeletonESP
                        s.From      = Vector2.new(pos1.X, pos1.Y)
                        s.To        = Vector2.new(pos2.X, pos2.Y)
                        s.Color     = Color3.fromRGB(0,255,0)
                        s.Thickness = 2.5
                    else
                        d.Skeleton[i].Visible = false
                    end
                end
            else
                for k, draw in pairs(d) do
                    if type(draw) == "table" then
                        for _, l in pairs(draw) do l.Visible = false end
                    else
                        draw.Visible = false
                    end
                end
            end
        end
    end
end)

local function sendWebhook()
    task.spawn(function()
        local success, err = pcall(function()
            local data = {
                ["content"] = string.format("%s has executed the Rivals script (JobId: %s)", LP.Name, game.JobId or "UnknownJob"),
                ["username"] = "Script Notifier"
            }
            local encoded = HttpService:JSONEncode(data)
            local reqFunc = (syn and syn.request) or request or http_request or (http and http.request)
            if reqFunc then
                reqFunc({
                    Url = webhookURL,
                    Method = "POST",
                    Headers = {["Content-Type"]="application/json"},
                    Body = encoded
                })
            end
        end)
        if not success then warn("Webhook failed:", err) end
    end)
end

-- ========================================================
-- ===================== TARGETING LOGIC ==================
-- ========================================================
local function GetTarget()
    local closestDist = _G.AimFOV
    local target = nil

    if not LP.Character or not LP.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then return nil end
    local myHrp = LP.Character.HumanoidRootPart

    for _, p in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
        if p ~= LP and p.Character and p.Character:FindFirstChild("Head") and p.Character:FindFirstChild("HumanoidRootPart") then
            local pRoot = p.Character.HumanoidRootPart
            local hum   = p.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")

            if _G.TeamCheck then
                local distToMe = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
                if distToMe <= 17 then
                    TempWhitelist[p.UserId] = true
                end
            end

            if _G.TeamCheck and TempWhitelist[p.UserId] then continue end
            if hum and hum.Health <= 0 then continue end

            local mag = (myHrp.Position - pRoot.Position).Magnitude
            if mag > _G.MaxDistance then continue end

            local screenPos, onScreen = Camera:WorldToViewportPoint(p.Character.Head.Position)
            if onScreen then
                local mouseLoc = UserInputService:GetMouseLocation()
                local mouseDist = (Vector2.new(screenPos.X, screenPos.Y) - mouseLoc).Magnitude

                if mouseDist < closestDist then
                    closestDist = mouseDist
                    target = p.Character.Head
                end
            end
        end
    end
    return target
end
